name: Stormlord
overview: Prepare to enter worlds of terror, where daylight battles the darkened night. You, StormLord, have been summoned to the valley of the Enchanted Realm to rescue the entombed princesses captured by the Evil Rotting Crone. Only you possess the power and fury necessary to vanquish all who dare oppose you. Prepare to charge into battle with the dreaded Draconian Fire Dogs. Rescue the entombed princesses hidden throughout the desolated world. Fight to survive so that the legend of StormLord will be told for centuries.
